beans.title: Robusta Beans
beans.desc: Arabica beans are by far the most popular type of coffee beans, making up about 60% of the world’s coffee. These tasty beans originated many centuries ago in the highlands of Ethiopia, and may even be the first coffee beans ever consumed!

beans.title: Arabica Beans
beans.desc: Arabica beans are by far the most popular type of coffee beans, making up about 60% of the world’s coffee. These tasty beans originated many centuries ago in the highlands of Ethiopia, and may even be the first coffee beans ever consumed!

drinks.title: Cappuccino
drinks.desc: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top.

drinks.title: Cappuccino
drinks.desc: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top.

drinks.title: Americano
drinks.desc: Americano is a diluted espresso made by adding hot water, resulting in a milder, smoother coffee.

drinks.title: Espresso
drinks.desc: Espresso is a concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground beans, known for its rich and intense flavor.

drinks.title: Macchiato
drinks.desc: Macchiato is an espresso-based drink topped with a small amount of foamed milk for a bold yet slightly creamy flavor.
